name: biomni-annotate-celltype-panhumanpy
title: Biomni: Annotate Cell Type with PanhumanPy
description: Hierarchical cell type annotation using panhumanpy and Azimuth Neural Network
content:
Overview

Performs hierarchical cell type annotation on single-cell RNA-seq data using the panhumanpy package and Azimuth Neural Network. Provides multi-level cell type labels with confidence scores.

Features

  • Hierarchical annotation at multiple resolutions
  • Confidence scores for predictions
  • Optional label refinement for consistent granularity
  • UMAP visualization with annotations

Input

AnnData H5AD file containing scRNA-seq data

Output

Annotated H5AD file with cell type labels and visualization plots
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/genomics/annotate_celltype_panhumanpy.py "${adataFile}" -o "${outputDir}" ${additionalParams}

spec.name: adataFile
spec.label: AnnData H5AD File
spec.description: Upload scRNA-seq data in H5AD format
